title: Work Experience
body:
I am a 15 year old boy who has an interest in working with riot. My high school is offering 1 week of work experience at our dream job. I was wondering how I could get work experience at riot games in Sydney. Is it possible that I can go to their office in the city and talk about it there with them?? Working with riot would be a huge success for me, I started playing league a year ago and I am in love with the game. 
Any help would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: heck no xD are u cereal right now XD{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
this guy cant be cereal xD
IKR XD 15 year old more like de XdD
